sentences.cn: 一个性格坦率、有话直说的男人

sentences.en: It was only because I had no alternative that I was so impolite and plainspoken.
sentences.cn: 我是因为走投无路才那么毫无礼貌,出言不逊.

sentences.en: Let it be no detraction from his merits to say he is plainspoken.
sentences.cn: 说他坦率的时候请别忘记他的那些优点.

words.tran_cn: 老实说的；直言不讳的；说话直率的

trans.tran_en: saying exactly what you think, especially in a way that people think is honest rather than rude
